attributes.action: Guarantee a universal basic income for the self employed during this pandemic
attributes.background: Freelance actors, directors, musicians, film, tv and theatre technicians have no income for the foreseeable future due to Film and TV production and Theatre closures.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302284
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303345

Since you started your petition the Government has announced support for self-employed individuals: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/chancellor-gives-support-to-millions-of-self-employed-individuals

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
